title: Star Wars Eclipse saved after all
description: LucasArts will continue to develop Star Wars Eclipse, which many belived it was going to get canceled.

title: Fans are bringing Club Penguin back to life
description: Latin American fans of the popular game 'Club Penguin' have recreated a safe and fun version of it after its closure.

title: Jedi Survivor will be released on March 2023
description: The anticipated Star Wars game will be available on stores on March 2023. It is expected that a new trailer for the game will be launched on late December of this year.
